original: Reinhold Otto Mauritz, kontraktsprost, Norra Vi, f. 8/10/82 i Borgsjö, Västern. 1., av domprosten Otto W. o. Ingeborg Sandberg. G. 16 m. AHce Kindwall. Barn: Ulla f. 17, g. m. jur. kand. Bertil Henriques, Ingeborg 18, g. m. finmek. Holger Nielsen, Lars 22, merk. ing., Ann-So’fi 22, tj :m. i Riksförs :anst., g, m. jur. kand. Olle Björck. — Mogiex. i Luleå 03, teol. fil. ex. 05, teol, kand. C^, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Luleå stift 09. V. pastor i Karl Gustav 09, tf. kapellpred. i Tärendö 11-16, kyrkoh. där 16, i Norra Vi sed. 23, kontr :prost i Ydre kontr. sed. 2!5, i S. Vedboi kontr. sed. 43. Ordf. i kyrkostämma, folksk :styr., pastoratskyrkoråd o. Eksjö-kretsen av Allm. sv. prästfören. Var i Tärendö ordf. i bl. a. lok:styr. f. SvRK, Norrb. läns arbets-stugor o. pens :ndn. Skr.: art. i tidn. o. tidskr., spec. betr. språk- o. kulturfrågor i sv. finnbygden. LVO, SvRKSM. , Gerd Elisabeth Blume-, prakt, läkare, Göteborg, f. 29/6/06 i Lysekil av stadsläk. Riber Blume o. Elin Maria Högberg. G. 34 m. jur. kand. Carl Oswakl Westerberg. Barn: Helena Christina (Bitte) f. 36, Peter 37, Nicola 41. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 24, med. kand. i Upps. 29, med. Hc. v. Ka-rol. inst. 36. Assist :läk. v. Kronpr. Lo-visas vårdanst. somm. 35, friv. assist, v. Sabbats^bergs sjukh. o. Örebro las. med. avd. 36 o. 37, dito v. Gbgs barn-sjukh. 38 o. 39, v. Sahlgrenska sjukh. med. avd. II 42, skolläk. v. Gbgs folksk. sed. 42, egen prakt, i Gbg sed. 43. Led. av Gbgs teaterstyr., led. av styr. f. Gbgs h. samsk. Utg. ett ant. skr. i med. ämmen.
translated: Reinhold Otto Mauritz, chaplain, Norra Vi, b. 8/10/82 in Borgsjö, Västern. 1st child of Dean Otto W. and Ingeborg Sandberg. Married on 16 with AHce Kindwall. Children: Ulla b. 17, m. to jur. cand. Bertil Henriques, Ingeborg b. 18, m. to engineer Holger Nielsen, Lars b. 22, notable engineer, Ann-So’fi b. 22, civil servant in Riksförs :anst., m. to jur. cand. Olle Björck. — Received degree from Luleå in 03, theological degree in 05, ordained as a priest in Luleå diocese in 09 after passing practical theological exams. Assistant pastor in Karl Gustav in 09, temporary chapel preacher in Tärendö 11-16, parish priest there in 16, in Norra Vi since 23, dean of Ydre deanery since 25, and in S. Vedboi deanery since 43. Chairman of church assembly, public school board, parish church council, and Eksjö district of the General Swedish Priest Association. Was chairman of, among other things, local board for the Church of Sweden, Norrbotten County's workhouses, and pension funds. Written articles in newspapers and magazines, especially regarding language and cultural issues in the Swedish Finn community. Received LVO, Swedish Red Cross Medal. Gerd Elisabeth Blume-, general practitioner, Göteborg, b. 29/6/06 in Lysekil to city physician Riber Blume and Elin Maria Högberg. Married in 34 to jur. cand. Carl Oswakl Westerberg. Children: Helena Christina (Bitte) b. 36, Peter b. 37, Nicola b. 41. — Completed secondary school in Gbg in 24, bachelor's degree in medicine in Uppsala in 29, medical degree from Karolinska Institute in 36. Assistant doctor at Kronprinsessan Lovisa's hospital in the summer of 35, voluntary assistant at Sabbatsberg Hospital and Örebro County Hospital medical department in 36 and 37, the same at Gothenburg Children's Hospital in 38 and 39, at Sahlgrenska Hospital Medical Department II in 42, school doctor at Gothenburg primary schools since 42, private practice in Gbg since 43. Member of the board for Gothenburg Theatre, member of the board for Gothenburg Higher Coeducational School. Published several works in medical subjects.
